messages.title: CHARLOTTE LESLIE
messages.content: An even more brilliant Bristol North West

messages.title: 6 COMMON SENSE THINGS
messages.content: TO KEEP ON SORTING OUT OUR COUNTRY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Re-open our Henbury Loop Railway Line
Let's make Shire and Avonmouth Bristol's go-to 'destination'
A proper stadium for our city
Keep unemployment falling, and support local business

issues.economy: Keep our economy growing, jobs coming
issues.health: Protect the NHS, schools and services
issues.socialWelfare: Reduce income tax for workers and pensioners

leaflet.personalStatement: Politics is not about party-political sniping. It is about getting stuff done—nationally and locally. Let my actions do the talking. So here are some things that together we have done in North West. I don’t believe in making promises. Because I believe if you work hard enough, you can deliver now.

politicalExperience.achievements: Re-opened the Portway Park and Ride (by the cricket club in Avonmouth), helped get the Bristol Free School open, and supported the great improvements of the existing schools.

quotes.text: Never spend what we don't have
quotes.source: 6 COMMON SENSE THINGS TO KEEP ON SORTING OUT OUR COUNTRY
6 COMMON SENSE THINGS TO KEEP ON SORTING OUT OUR COUNTRY

quotes.text: Ensure it always pays to work

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains multiple images of the candidate engaging with the community and various stakeholders.
